Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory651.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee stands on the highest spot of the Hetero Tower, staring at the giant core emanating a dangerous glow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee (?)', 3: "But because you're so close to succeeding, it's the most dangerous... You should know that."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes... It's the same this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee (?)', 3: 'As the last part of the trial, they will materialize an enemy from your past whom you hated, feared, felt regret, and were weak to the most.'}
{2: 'Lee (?)', 3: "I don't know which enemy you'll see, but... I believe that this time..."}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{3: 'His phantoms slowly merge together. In the end, they overlap Lee, signifying that all causality is conjugated here.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...This time, I will succeed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee turns to face the ever-changing space inside the tower and waits in silence—he seems to already know who will appear before him.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Thick red Punishing Heteromer drips down from the skies, slowly forming into two pale humanoids.'}
{3: 'Although they may look no different to humans, it is clear that the male and female beings in front of Lee are the enemies of the origin of humanity.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Imitating the appearance of humans... Imitating the intelligence of humans... Imitating the closeness of humans...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The twins slowly get up from the ground and coldly look at Lee. He feels even more uneasy than the first time he saw them.'}
{3: 'Lee knows they are merely replicas the Hetero Tower created according to his memories, but they feel just as threatening, if not more, than the originals.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You imitate all that is human except for emotions... I bet you can't relate to what I'm feeling right now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The female twin lifts her left arm at Lee. What should have been an arm has been modified into a bow.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'As the female twin slightly moves her arm, an arrow formed with a high concentration of Punishing Virus strikes Lee at high speed and explodes.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She shows no emotion—no joy nor excitement—and just lowers her arm mechanically, trying to confirm the death of the Construct in front of her.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Unfortunately for her, after the dust has settled, only a blurry illusion remains where the arrow exploded, the Construct that was supposed to die is nowhere to be seen.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've failed numerous times... Humanity has also failed numerous times..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: "The male twin hears Lee's voice from above him and immediately swings his fist upward, blocking Lee's aerial attack with his firearm case."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "Simultaneously, the female twin dodges backward under the cover of her teammate and swiftly fires a few arrows at Lee's back."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Although this attack comes from a dead angle, it is blocked by Lee with his firearm case at an impossible angle.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Numerous failures... It has drowned humanity in despair but also strengthened their determination...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee rapidly fires several shots at the male twin. Even though he raises his arms to guard himself, he is still pushed back by the force of the bullets.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Constant observation, constant research, and constant innovation.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Thanks to the enhanced speed from the rapid-fire, Lee is already next to the male twin and kicks his sturdy arm into pieces.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But this short period of time he focused on the male twin is enough for the female twin to conjugate a new arrow. This time, she is sure that she will not miss.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'However, before she can fire, a heavy firearm case plows into the female twin from an impossible angle and sends her flying through the air.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Small advances accumulate into big leaps.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 3: '—Without the twins noticing, an illusion has already taken the place of the Lee who kicked the male Hetero-Creature. The real Lee is currently high up in the air, his rapid-fire pistol and firearm case completing their transformation in an instant.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've already seen and simulated this moment in my mind a million times—this moment when we meet again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Tips for shooting? Why would you need to know...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "There's not much to it, really... Just don't fall asleep while aiming, I guess...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You have to be familiar with your firearm, and... just have the confidence you'll hit the target.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory263.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Graviton bombs? Shhh... How'd you know I have that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Making high-energy bullets...? And how'd you know the Science Council's File IUO-9 is flawed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Never mind that... I don't know what you want them for, but if you ever let your commandant know I was the one who gave it to you, you better watch your back!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'A weapon that can handle multiple situations... What induced you to consider that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "No... Of course it's possible, but these kinds of weapons usually lack balance, and they're not very useful in most situations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What kind of enemy... are you planning to fight?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Hypothetically... if I had to face an enemy I have no chance of winning against alone, what do you think I should do, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think you should avoid these situations in the first place.', 3: '140'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You're right, but what if... I really did find myself in that situation, just hypothetically, of course.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Hm, if there really is such a strong enemy, they probably won't slip up no matter how long they fight.", 3: '142'}
{2: "So I'd say the best defense is offense.", 3: '143'}
{2: "Don't let the enemy be in control of the situation, you should be the one in control.", 3: '145'}
{2: 'Carefully plan your every step, observe your enemy, and simulate their thought process.', 3: '146'}
{2: "There may only be one chance, don't miss it, and then...", 3: '147'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory651.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Leaping into the air, Lee aims his sniper rifle at the twins and he waits—he waits for his only chance.'}
{3: 'All causality intertwines through time and space, sand in the hourglass slowly drops, until...'}
{3: 'The bullet of everything will eventually pierce through all.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And then... I pull the trigger.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Lee grasps that second of a chance and fires a bullet through the heads of both of the twins, turning their heads into dust.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Hmph... Of course they don't die so easily.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As they are simulations of the tower, their heads do not seem to be a fatal weak point like other Hetero-Creatures. The thick red liquid composing their bodies stirs and forms new heads.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Come on then, no matter how many times you revive... I'll shoot you off into the end of spacetime.", 4: '1'}
